ray.rage.scene

Interface Node.Listener

  • Enclosing interface:
    Node

    public static interface Node.Listener
    A listener for Node events.
    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onNodeAttached(Node child, Node newParent)
      A Node has been attached to a new parent.
      void onNodeDetached(Node orphan, Node oldParent)
      A Node has been detached from its parent.
      void onNodeUpdated(Node n)
      A Node has had its derived transforms updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onNodeAttached

        void onNodeAttached(Node child,
                    Node newParent)
        A Node has been attached to a new parent.

        The child node must be attached before this method is invoked. In other words, child.getParent() == newParent must be true. The new parent is passed separately for convenience and consistency.

        Parameters:
        child - The overly attached node ;)
        newParent - The node that just became the child's parent.

      • onNodeUpdated

        void onNodeUpdated(Node n)
        A Node has had its derived transforms updated.

        This method is invoked at the end of the node's Node.update(boolean, boolean), which generally takes place when the scene graph is being updated. This is not triggered by simple state changes made to the node outside of its update method.

        Parameters:
        n - The updated node.

      • onNodeDetached

        void onNodeDetached(Node orphan,
                    Node oldParent)
        A Node has been detached from its parent.

        The orphan node must be detached before this method is invoked. In other words, orphan.getParent() == null must be true.

        Parameters:
        orphan - The overly detached node ;)
        oldParent - The node that used to be the child's parent.
